attributes.action: dual the A47 to reduce the number of deaths that occur.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The A47 is a deadly road on which many deaths occur every year, the vast majority of which could have been prevented. A similar petition to this was placed before the government back in 2008 and yet nothing seems to have been done to the road and people are still dying due to accidents which could have been prevented. Will the government reconsider making the A47 a dual carriageway now before more avoidable deaths occur?

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to dual the A47 to reduce the number of deaths that occur.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=Dual-A47


Her Majesty's Government
